name: Saqib Moosa
title: Vice President Membership
brief: I am a graduate engineer at Jaguar Land Rover and am very passionate about public speaking. I pioneer public speaking workshops at universities around the country.

name: Ravinder Singh
title: Vice President Public Relations
brief: Working as an Integrity Engineer at DNV GL, I enjoy public speaking and leadership events organised by Toastmasters club. My passion is to make Godiva Speakers a popular club benefitting the community.
